title: Hook Up
description: Hook up is a ground-breaking novel which challenges stereotypical ideas about love and relationships, gender identity and sexuality. This is a novel which celebrates life in all its diversity, promoting the idea that everyone should be allowed to be free to express their own desires â€” as long as they are not hurting others.Follow Macy as she unlocks a whole new world of daring sexual exploits, adventures and acceptance. She meets Tobias, a young architect who, like her, is on a journey of self-discovery. Together with friends, they discover a new way of life where everyone is accepted and are free to be who they are instead of conforming to societal norms.
author: Harvey Jones
